titles.title: To require the Secretary of Energy to assign the same priority to providing renewable energy production incentive payments for landfill gas facilities as the priority assigned to providing such payments for other biomass facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 3/13/2001--Introduced. Amends the Energy Policy Act of 1992 to instruct the Secretary of Energy to assign the same priority to renewable energy production incentive payments for landfill gas facilities as to such payments for closed loop biomass facilities.
